title: FS: Christy Mathewson T206 Sweet Carporal..SOLD!!!
author: thetruthisoutthere

posts.post_title: FS: Christy Mathewson T206 Sweet Carporal..SOLD!!!
posts.post_content:
A few years ago I was excited about purchasing my first T206 card (Christy Mathewson) even I'm an autograph guy, but unfortunately just never had the time to pursue the purchasing of more, so I putting this one up for sale.

I'd rather it be in the possession of someone who will cherish it.

I think I paid $39.00 for this, so that's what I am asking.  I have no idea what it's worth/value is in the condition it is in.  I have to say it is a cool card to own.

Thank you.

PayPal via FF please and shipping is Free.

Please message me if anyone wants it.



[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=321044&d=1530040619[/IMG]

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=321045&d=1530040629[/IMG]
That's a steal, even in that condition. Nice pickup!

[quote name="sterlingfox" post=1790025]Sold. PM incoming.[/QUOTE]

Sold.  Thank you, Greg.

I wasn't looking to make money on it. 

Just wanted it to go a nice home that enjoys the T206 cards.

[quote name="ronniehatesjazz" post=1790026]That's a steal, even in that condition. Nice pickup![/QUOTE]

Wasn't sold to me :(

[quote name="sterlingfox" post=1790034]Wasn't sold to me :(

Seller decided to sell to first PM rather than first to respond (or to an offer above asking).

In both scenarios, the seller here is being unethical.[/QUOTE]

Nothing shady going on here at all. Chris is a stand up guy and I can’t believe I have to do this.
Here is Chris’s original post time stamped 3:17 PM. Note he states “Please message me if anyone want it”
[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=321134&d=1530135460[/IMG]

Here is my PM to Chris at 3:20 PM stating I’ll take it.
[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=321135&d=1530135581[/IMG]

Here is the post by sterlingfox at 3:23

 [IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=321136&d=1530135689[/IMG]

Again, nothing shady going on. I PM’d Chris at 3:20 stating I would take the card.

Greg

Chris is a standup guy and regardless of timestamps you cant be in your inbox and viewing your post at the same time... 

Cool card that will be appreciated by its new owner. Nice of you to give it a new home chris!

Thanks for coming forward and clearing that up, Greg. I take back everything I said.

I hope both you and Chris can understand where I'm coming from after I was lied to and cheated out of a multi thousand dollar Cobb postcard recently by dealings that went on behind my back.

[url]http://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=256187[/url]

I might suggest editing your earlier post with your incorrect assessment of the seller's ethics.

[quote name="mechanicalman" post=1790469]I might suggest editing your earlier post with your incorrect assessment of the seller's ethics.[/QUOTE]

Done.

[quote name="sterlingfox" post=1790472]Done.[/QUOTE]

No hard feelings.

Water under the bridge.
I made that same mistake when I first joined this site.  I thought if you posted first in the thread, that meant you got the card.  It happens.

[quote name="Luke" post=1790516]I made that same mistake when I first joined this site.  I thought if you posted first in the thread, that meant you got the card.  It happens.[/QUOTE]

I prefer messaging because I am not always online here, but if do I receive a message, I see it in my email.

Like I wrote, no hard feelings.
